product_name: Merrell Crush Glove Mary Jane Shoes - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The lightweight, barefoot-style Merrell Crush Glove Mary Jane Shoes will get you through your training sessions and work with your wardrobe ensemble afterward. Mesh uppers feature synthetic overlays for a glovelike fit with maximum breathability. Compression-molded EVA midsoles feature a 0mm ball-to-heel drop and provide cushioning that makes outdoor adventures easy on your feet. Zero drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. M-Select FRESH natural enzymes prevent odors from developing. Merrell Crush Glove Mary Jane Shoes shoes have nonmarking Vibram(R) rubber soles for excellent grip and durability. Overstock.
short_description: The lightweight, barefoot-style Merrell Crush Glove Mary Jane Shoes will get you through your training sessions and work with your wardrobe ensemble afterward.
